typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Country/Region} as string,
		Continent as string,
		Population as string,
		TotalCases as string,
		NewCases as string,
		TotalDeaths as string,
		NewDeaths as string,
		TotalRecovered as string,
		NewRecovered as string,
		ActiveCases as string,
		{Serious,Critical} as string,
		{Tot Cases/1M pop} as string,
		{Deaths/1M pop} as string,
		TotalTests as string,
		{Tests/1M pop} as string,
		{WHO Region} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> data
